short-description: A woman seeks to uncover the truth behind the disappearance of her best friend.
title: L'ombre d'Emily

short-description: An alcoholic man lives in a perpetual stupor while his six children cope as best they can.
title: Shameless

short-description: Two strangers are drawn to a mysterious pharmaceutical trial that will, they're assured, with no complications or side-effects whatsoever, solve all of their problems, permanently. Things do not go as planned.
title: Maniac

short-description: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, Mike Ross, a brilliant college dropout, finds himself a job working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.
title: Suits, avocats sur mesure

short-description: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show "Horsin' Around" in the '90s, now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.
title: BoJack Horseman

short-description: A faded TV actor and his stunt double embark on an odyssey to make a name for themselves in the film industry during the Helter Skelter reign of terror in 1969 Los Angeles.
title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

short-description: This contemporary romantic comedy, based on a global bestseller, follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu to Singapore to meet her boyfriend's family.
title: Crazy Rich Asians

short-description: Sam, an 18-year-old on the autism spectrum, decides it's time to find a girlfriend, a journey that sets Sam's mom on her own life-changing path as her son seeks more independence.
title: Atypical

short-description: A housewife in the 1950s decides to become a stand-up comic.
title: La fabuleuse Mme Maisel

short-description: A true-crime satire that explores the aftermath of a costly high school prank that left twenty-seven faculty cars vandalized with phallic images.
title: American Vandal

short-description: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.
title: La prophétie de l'horloge

short-description: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.
title: Ocean's 8

short-description: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos decends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.
title: Assassination Nation

short-description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.
title: Deadpool 2

short-description: Five friends with big egos and slightly arrogant attitudes are the proprietors of an Irish bar in Philadelphia.
title: Philadelphia

short-description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
title: Friends

short-description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
title: The Office

short-description: Ron Stallworth, an African-American police officer from Colorado, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan with the help of a white surrogate, who eventually becomes head of the local branch.
title: BlacKkKlansman - J'ai infiltré le Ku Klux Klan

short-description: Convicted of a decade old crime of transporting drug money to an ex-girlfriend, normally law-abiding Piper Chapman is sentenced to a year and a half behind bars to face the reality of how life-changing prison can really be.
title: Orange Is the New Black

short-description: A case of mistaken identity results in unexpected romance when the most popular girl in high school and the biggest loser must come together to win over their crushes.
title: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser

short-description: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.
title: The Big Bang Theory

short-description: Jake Peralta, an immature, but talented N.Y.P.D. detective in Brooklyn's 99th Precinct, comes into immediate conflict with his new commanding officer, the serious and stern Captain Ray Holt.
title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

short-description: A heartwarming and emotional story about a unique set of triplets, their struggles, and their wonderful parents.
title: This Is Us

short-description: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.
title: NCIS: Enquêtes spéciales

short-description: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.
title: Johnny English contre-attaque

short-description: A woman struggles to define what it means to be good.
title: The Good Place

short-description: Three different, but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.
title: Modern Family

short-description: A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.
title: Nouvelle génération

short-description: In 1850s Oregon, a gold prospector is chased by the infamous duo of assassins, the Sisters brothers.
title: Les Frères Sisters

short-description: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.
title: Pitch Perfect 3

short-description: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.
title: Les indestructibles 2

short-description: June and Oscar live a comfortable but very predictable wedded life when suddenly they find themselves in a completely unexpected situation, raising questions about love and marriage.
title: Forever

short-description: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.
title: Tag

short-description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.
title: Rick et Morty

short-description: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.
title: Hôtel Transylvanie 3: Des vacances monstrueuses

short-description: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.
title: Barry

short-description: A disgraced, dissatisfied civil lawyer-turned-beauty pageant coach takes on a vengeful, bullied teenager as his client and has no idea what he's about to unleash upon the world.
title: Insatiable

short-description: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
title: Scott Pilgrim

short-description: After draining his life savings to enter a team in the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem, Dax (Lil Rel Howery) is dealt a series of unfortunate setbacks, including losing his ...
title: Uncle Drew

short-description: Based in Atlanta, Earn and his cousin Alfred are trying to make their way up in the world through the rap scene. Along the way they come face to face with social and economic issues ...
title: Atlanta

short-description: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.
title: South Park

short-description: Feeling trapped in the stifling, wealthy enclave of Westport, Connecticut, Anders Hill (Ben Mendelsohn) retires from his job in finance and leaves his wife (Edie Falco) in the hopes that it...
title: Au pays des habitudes

short-description: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph", Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.
title: Ralph 2.0

short-description: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
title: Thor Ragnarok

short-description: A series centered around a group of football players and their families, friends, and handlers.
title: Ballers

short-description: A Yeti is convinced that the elusive creatures known as "humans" really do exist.
title: Yéti & Compagnie

short-description: A disgraced former NYPD officer lives with his son, an earnest, obsessively honest NYPD detective.
title: The Good Cop

short-description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.
title: Mary Poppins

short-description: Jeff, a famous children's television icon, struggles to retain his sanity as his family falls apart.
title: Kidding

short-description: A father recounts to his children, through a series of flashbacks, the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.
title: How I Met Your Mother
